channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road markings, particularly gyratory lines almost gone!, 15th October
item.description:
Especially bad on roundabout coming from Barnwood and crossing Cheltenham Road roundabout entrance.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge Court Roundabout, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 'Bodged' road repair worse than before., 15th October
item.description:
On bend, left carriageway towards Churchdown
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchdown Lane, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped fridge and wardrobe in layby on a40, 15th October
item.description:
There is a fridge and large wardrobe left in the layby on the a40 going from the new innsworth roundabout to the elmbridge court roundabout
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Flytipping (not witnessed and no evidence likely)

item.title: Road has been repaired to a very poor standard, better than the first attempt but still not suitable for the speed of the road, 15th October
item.description:
How is it difficult to repair a section to a good standard, it not suitable for the speed of the road, if weather was bad at night and someone doesn't know the road is uneven it could casue an accident
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: We have a tree outside the front of the house that looks increasingly vulnerable, leaning toward the house and very top heavy It is on public land and would appreciate if someone could come have a look to judge what to do with it Many thanks, 15th October
item.description:
The tree is located on the path on the road outside the houses 62 and 64 welland lodge road, Gl52 3HQ

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Starvehall Farm Footpath, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering under the car, 15th October
item.description:
This man decided to finish his can of rebull and then decided to open his door and fling thw can under his car and then close the door, before deciding to roll a cigeret.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dinglewell, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing street name by No22, 15th October
item.description:
The ‘Sandstar Close’ street name is missing (picture attached) from the corner of No 22 & has been for a few weeks. I am not sure if this has already been reported or not.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandstar Close, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
